column5: Designed by a famous architect, BSM is a private residence in Montgomery Farm, Allen (26m north of Dallas). Only the private guest house (3/2, 1100 sf) is available for Airbnb stays.   Outdoor weddings, parties and events are permitted only with advance, written permission of hosts. Guest must disclose type of function, number of anticipated guests, and the like. Host will then address additional fees that will be assessed, in addition to stated Airbnb fees.
